SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model

Interface ServerPlayerView

All Known Implementing Classes:
ServerPlayer
public interface ServerPlayerView
Read-only object which represent a player of an in-progress game, as seen by the server.

Compared to the client, the server can see: - the shelfie of any player (getShelfie()) - the personal goal of any player (getPersonalGoal()) - the private score of any player at any point (privateScore())

See Also:

    Return the shelfie as matrix of tiles
    Provider<Integer>
    privateScore()
    Returns the player current score, as seen by the player itself
    Provider<Integer>
    publicScore()
    Returns the player current score, as seen by the other players
